sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Vim package contains the ex, gview, gvim, rgview, rgvim, rview, rvim, view, vim, vimtutor and xxd programs.

sect3.title: ex
sect3.para: ex starts vim in Ex mode.

sect3.title: gview
sect3.para: gview is the GUI version of view.

sect3.title: gvim
sect3.para: gvim is the GUI version of vim.

sect3.title: rgview
sect3.para: rgview is the GUI version of rview.

sect3.title: rgvim
sect3.para: rgvim is the GUI version of rvim.

sect3.title: rview
sect3.para: rview is a restricted version of view. No shell commands can be started and Vim can't be suspended.

sect3.title: rvim
sect3.para: rvim is the restricted version of vim. No shell commands can be started and Vim can't be suspended.

sect3.title: view
sect3.para: view starts vim in read-only mode.

sect3.title: vim
sect3.para: vim starts vim in the normal, default way.

sect3.title: xxd
sect3.para: xxd makes a hexdump or does the reverse.
